Mr. Freeman. Have you arrived yet?

A lot to do and relatively entertaining. The puzzles are great and the action feels just right. The only problem is that the management between health, armor, and ammo can become very tedious. So much so, that I had to quick save and load every 5 seconds when I took the slightest bit of damage just so I could feel confident through the next area. It also did not help that Vortigaunts spawn behind you as you are clearing the playing field in front of you and instantly hit you with their unavoidable hit-scan electric attack which removes a good bit of armor and drains your health. Other than that, it was pretty fun for 13 hours worth of content. Playing this game requires a lot of knowledge about video games in general. If you do not know much about the language of video games, it will force you to learn through trial and error. It teaches you a lot of valuable skills that can be transferred over to a lot of other games.

Right away this game is amazing but challenging. You have to think outside the box, while using a variety of different weapons, and maneuver through different chapters against increasingly difficult enemies. I recommend anyone with an interest in this game or fps as a whole to buy it and give it a go as it is the first game in amazing series. Anyways here a friendly reminder from your boy; Run, Think, Shoot, Live. (Also save. A L O T.)

System Shock en 1994 ya lo hizo antes, pero personalmente este fue el primer titulo en 1ºpersona que jugue y tenia una historia, un buen argumento de ciencia ficcion. Half Life supuso una inspiracion para muchisimos juegos posteriores. 
Half-life tiene una gran atmosfera, un diseño de escenarios brillante, La instalacion de Black Messa es gigantesca, imponente y algunas zonas son realmente aterradoras, la IA enemiga es magnifica, en 1998 nunca vimos algo asi, ni su apartado sonoro, con esos echos, el propio sonido del traje de Freeman, muchos detalles que ahora pueden no significar mucho, pero a finales de los 90s nunca habiamos experimentado nada parecido y menos aun con tantisima calidad, fue todo tan novedoso que es normal que este Titulo pase a la historia.
This game is really good I love playing it and I suggest that you play it too.
probably the most fun game ive ever played

Antes de nada, si pudiese darle una nota neutral se la daría.
Aunque he intentado darle varias oportunidades para engancharme, no he podido.
En varias (demasiadas ocasiones) el juego no te deja muy claro hacia donde tienes que ir, o que tienes que hacer, siendo para mi el mejor ejemplo el de las cajas verdes que bloquean el camino, y que resulta que tenias que saltar y pulsar el botón de agacharse en medio del aire (a mi en ningún momento me explicaron eso).
Entiendo que es un problema debido a la época en la que se hizo un juego, pero eso no quita que sea un problema.
Aunque objetivamente es un juego muy bueno teniendo en cuenta la época en la que se lanzo, a día de hoy (al menos a mi) se me hace un juego que constantemente te pausa la acción por no saber donde ir o que hacer.
Alto guiso, vuelto a terminar en 2021 y sigue siendo perfecto.
Probably the best game I've ever played. Multiplayer's also fun.

Half-Life is a game that any developer who wants to create a cinematic experience should take influence from. Even if Half-Life hasn't aged in terms of graphics and controls it's still an atmospheric masterpiece that's a blast to play.
